 The date formatter used to generate strings from time intervals.
NSDate * CPTimeFormatter::referenceDate
 Date from which time intervals are taken. If nil, the standard reference date (1 January 2001, GMT) is used.

 The axis title. If nil, no title is drawn.

 The offset distance between the axis title and the axis line.

Labels

CPAxisLabelingPolicy CPAxis::axisLabelingPolicy
 The axis labeling policy.
CGFloat CPAxis::axisLabelOffset
 The offset distance between the tick marks and labels.
CGFloat CPAxis::axisLabelRotation
 The rotation of the axis labels in radians. Set this property to M_PI/2.0 to have labels read up the screen, for example.
CPTextStyle * CPAxis::axisLabelTextStyle
 The text style used to draw the label text.
NSNumberFormatter * CPAxis::axisLabelFormatter
 The number formatter used to format the label text. If you need a non-numerical label, such as a date, you can use a formatter than turns the numerical plot coordinate into a string (eg 'Jan 10, 2010'). The CPTimeFormatter is useful for this purpose.
NSSet * CPAxis::axisLabels
 The set of axis labels.
BOOL CPAxis::needsRelabel
 If YES, the axis needs to be relabeled before the layer content is drawn.
NSArray * CPAxis::labelExclusionRanges
 An array of CPPlotRange objects. Any tick marks and labels falling inside any of the ranges in the array will not be drawn.
id< CPAxisDelegate > CPAxis::delegate
 The axis delegate.

Major Ticks

NSDecimal CPAxis::majorIntervalLength
 The distance between major tick marks expressed in data coordinates.
CPLineStyle * CPAxis::majorTickLineStyle
 The line style for the major tick marks. If nil, the major ticks are not drawn.
CGFloat CPAxis::majorTickLength
 The length of the major tick marks.
NSSet * CPAxis::majorTickLocations
 A set of axis coordinates for all major tick marks.
NSUInteger CPAxis::preferredNumberOfMajorTicks
 The number of ticks that should be targeted when autogenerating positions. This property only applies when the CPAxisLabelingPolicyAutomatic policy is in use.

NSUInteger CPAxis::minorTicksPerInterval
 The number of minor tick marks drawn in each major tick interval.

 The length of the minor tick marks.
NSSet * CPAxis::minorTickLocations
 A set of axis coordinates for all minor tick marks.

Grid Lines

CPLineStyle * CPAxis::minorGridLineStyle
 The line style for the minor grid lines. If nil, the minor grid lines are not drawn.
